description.p: rosgraph contains two tools for visualizing information about the ROS Computation Graph: rosgraph and rxgraph. rxgraph is a visual tool that displays a graph of the dynamic ROS Computation Graph. rosgraph is a command-line tool that prints out Nodes and Services to the console on a periodic basis.
rxgraph uses xdot.py by Jose Fonseca, which is licensed under LGPL.
